title: Improving COVID-19 Contact Tracing, Jobless Claims
itunes:title: Improving COVID-19 Contact Tracing, Jobless Claims
description:
Emily Gurley, Associate Scientist at the Johns Hopkins University Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses her efforts to improve COVID-19 contact tracing. We get Businessweek Economics with Steve Blitz, Chief U.S. Economist at TS Lombard. He discusses weekly jobless claims and the outlook for a recession. Henry Schuck, Founder and CEO at ZoomInfo, walks through his company’s Nasdaq trading debut. And we Drive to the Close with Ann Miletti, Head of Active Equity at Wells Fargo Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
